common.description: A platform to manage exchanges efficiently.
common.cookie_consent: We use cookies to improve user experience.

login.title: Login to ETSII Exchanges
login.telegram_info: Users who are not yet registered in the system can request it from the Telegram bot.

footer.school_name: Higher Technical School of Computer Engineering

accepted_swaps.title: Accepted Swaps
accepted_swaps.subtitle: Select the swaps you want to generate. You can generate one swap for each group of subjects you are swapping with a student.
accepted_swaps.subject: Subject

available_swaps.title: Available Swaps
available_swaps.subtitle: Here you will find swaps compatible with your enrollment. If you see one interesting, accept the proposal to start the group exchange.
available_swaps.empty_title: No swaps available at the moment
available_swaps.empty_msg: Come back later or create your own swap request.

pdf_generation.title: Permutation Document Generation
pdf_generation.description: This form allows you to generate the necessary documentation to request a subject permutation. Please complete all mandatory fields and ensure the information is correct before submitting the form.
pdf_generation.instructions_1: Once you fill out the form, you can download a PDF with the permutation request. This PDF must be signed and sent to the system so your partner can fill in their data.
pdf_generation.instructions_2: When your partner signs the PDF, you can download it and send it to the administration.

errors.fix_errors: Please correct the errors in the form
errors.select_file: Please select a file to upload.
errors.validate_success: The permutation has been validated successfully.

modal.title: Validate Permutation
modal.message: Remember that requests must be submitted electronically (requires FNMT digital certificate), through the General State Administration Registry, indicating as recipient (use search engine) “University of Seville” and stating in the subject the name of the center "For E.T.S. of Computer Engineering". Otherwise, the procedure will NOT be registered by the school and the permutation cannot be performed.
